animeTitle: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru. Zoku OVA
otherNames: Oregairu OVA, My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU OVA, Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru. Zoku: Kitto, Onnanoko wa Osatou to Spice to Suteki na Nanika de Dekiteiru, やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている. 続 きっと, 女の子はお砂糖とスパイスと素敵な何かでできている。
synopsis: Bundled with 5bp's Yahari Game Demo Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru. Zoku game for the PlayStation Vita. It adapts a story focusing on Iroha Isshiki from volume 10.5 of the original light novel.
